verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there <S%H3426>yet<s%> any that is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> him <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>'s sake?

And there was of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>, and they <S%H7121>called<s%> him unto <S%H1732>David<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6717>him<s%>, Art thou Ziba? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy servant is <S%H5650>he<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there <S%H657>not<s%> yet <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> unto <S%H6717>him<s%>? And Ziba <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> hath yet a <S%H1121>son<s%>, who is <S%H5223>lame<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H375>him<s%>, Where is <S%H6717>he<s%>? And Ziba <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H1004>Behold<s%>, he is in the house of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%>, in <S%H3810>Lo-debar<s%>.

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%>, from <S%H3810>Lo-debar<s%>.

And <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>. And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H5650>Behold<s%>, thy servant!

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>him<s%>, Fear <S%H6213>not<s%>; for I will surely <S%H6213>show<s%> thee <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H7725>sake<s%>, and will restore thee all the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
And he did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What is thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that thou shouldest <S%H6437>look<s%> upon such a <S%H4191>dead<s%> dog as I <S%H3611>am<s%>?

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5288>servant<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1961>him<s%>, All that pertained to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and to all his <S%H1004>house<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H1121>him<s%>, thou, and thy sons, and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H113>fruits<s%>, that thy master's <S%H1121>son<s%> may have <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>: but <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> thy <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8548>alway<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%>. Now <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> had <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, According to all that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commandeth<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, so shall thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>. As for <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>, said the <S%H398>king<s%>, he shall eat at my <S%H7979>table<s%>, as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> had a <S%H6996>young<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4316>Mica<s%>. And all that <S%H4186>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> were <S%H5650>servants<s%> unto <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>.

So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for he did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7979>table<s%>. And he was <S%H6455>lame<s%> in <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
